COMMERCE, MARKETING
  (also detail person) a person who visits a company's customers, to give them information about the company's products and to find out about the level of sales, etc.: A pharmaceutical detailer promotes the use of, and sells, legal drugs and other pharmaceutical products to physicians, dentists, hospitals, etc.
TRANSPORT
  (also auto detailer) a person whose job is to clean the inside and outside of cars
